law.catch_line: Rights of employees of transit systems acquired by County.

text.section:
Sec. 2-152. Rights of employees of transit systems acquired by County.
Whenever the County acquires existing transit systems or facilities from a publicly owned public utility, to the extent necessary or feasible for the economic operation of such facilities, all of the employees of such acquired transit system whose duties pertain to the facilities acquired shall be employed in comparable positions in the County service and the pay status, seniority, vacation and sick leave rights shall be preserved and maintained to the fullest possible extent.
